Macro - Math
Macros
inc_16

increment a 16 bit value

Param
adr

the address pointing to the value

dec_16

decrement a 16 bit value

/!\ Warning /!\

  • Change A to 0

Param
adr

the address pointing to the value

dcx_16

decrement a 16 bit value offset by X

/!\ Warning /!\

  • Change A to 0

Param
adr

the address pointing to the value

X

offset

add_A2ptr

Add the A register to a 16 bit pointer

/!\ Warning /!\

  • Change A

Param
ptr

the address pointing to the value

val

The value to load to A (optionnal)

add_A2ptr

Add the A register to a 16 bit pointer

/!\ Warning /!\

  • Change A

Param
ptr

the address pointing to the value

val

The value to load to A
